titles.title: A bill to amend the Organic Foods Production Act of 1990 to prohibit the labeling of cloned livestock and products derived from cloned livestock as organic.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S1790)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry.

bill.summary:
2/8/2007--Introduced.
Amends the Organic Foods Production Act of 1990 to prohibit the labeling of cloned livestock and products derived from cloned livestock as organic. Defines "cloned livestock" as: (1) livestock produced as the result of somatic cell nuclear transfer or other asexual reproduction technologies; and (2) the progeny of such livestock.
